FROM python:3.8-buster

RUN apt-get update -y && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y jq && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

COPY make_tarball_entrypoint.sh /entrypoint.sh
ENTRYPOINT ["/entrypoint.sh"]
